name: Reactivating a user results in them showing up in the normal spot in the list, without the `Deactivated` label.

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P2 - Core Functions (Do core functions work?)
customFields.Cypress Reports: RELEASE - TM4J-Key-Mapped-In-Cypress-Release - TM4J key found Cypress release run report  (SDET/QA)

inline.description:
Reactivating a user results in them showing up in the normal spot in the list, without the `Deactivated` label.
--------------------
1. Reactivate a deactivated user
2. In LHS, click `+` next to `Direct Messages` and locate the user
inline.expectedResult: The reactivated user appears up in the normal spot in the list of users, without the `Deactivated` label.
